# Project Overview

This document provides a high-level overview of our current projects and initiatives.

## Current Projects

### Knowledge Management System

- **Status**: In Development
- **Priority**: High
- **Team**: Engineering, Documentation

The system allows us to:

- Create interconnected notes
- Track project status
- Collaborate effectively
